Package chameleon.linkage

Interface Summary
ILanguageModelID  
ILinkage Interface supporting the linking of chameleon with other applications.
ILinkageFactory Interface describing a class responsible for creating Linkage objects by various properties such as filenames or Compilation Units
IMetaModelFactory  
IParseErrorHandler  
ISourceSupplier An interface acting as an iterator of source objects that need to be supplied to a metamodelfactory
